com.jalios.util

Interface ServletUtil.ServletUtilAlternate

  • Enclosing class:
    ServletUtil

    public static interface ServletUtil.ServletUtilAlternate
    This interface is used internally by JCMS to provide custom behavior of ServletUtil and should not be used elsewhere.
    Since:
    jcms-5.7

    • Method Summary
